duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, oversee and drive the execution of the organization’s overall field strategy
Support the development of national and local campaigns and ensure alignment and integration across MFV departments
Collaborate with Data Director to ensure that program data sourcing, analysis and reporting informs the organization’s strategies
Support and manage training needs and on-the ground support for field and program efforts in states
Manage, at the national level, all inquiries related to programs and field operations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Program Development, Campaign Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
